consistency_guidelines.character: Use the same model face across all images in each gender category
consistency_guidelines.angle: Front-facing portrait with slight angle for dimension

ai_tool_settings.dalle3: Square format, photorealistic style, high quality

base_characters.female: Professional female model, 25-30 years old, neutral friendly expression, oval face shape, medium skin tone, brown eyes, natural makeup, studio lighting, clean white background, front-facing portrait, high quality, photorealistic
base_characters.male: Professional male model, 25-30 years old, neutral confident expression, square jaw, medium skin tone, brown eyes, clean-shaven (unless beard style), studio lighting, clean white background, front-facing portrait, high quality, photorealistic

women_hairstyles.long-layers: Professional female model, 25-30 years old, neutral friendly expression, oval face shape, medium skin tone, brown eyes, natural makeup, studio lighting, clean white background, front-facing portrait, high quality, photorealistic, long layered hair extending to mid-back, cascading layers with movement and volume, face-framing layers, natural brown hair color, salon-quality styling
women_hairstyles.beach-waves: Professional female model, 25-30 years old, neutral friendly expression, oval face shape, medium skin tone, brown eyes, natural makeup, studio lighting, clean white background, front-facing portrait, high quality, photorealistic, medium-length beach waves, tousled natural waves, effortless styling, light brown hair with natural highlights, relaxed texture
women_hairstyles.classic-bob: Professional female model, 25-30 years old, neutral friendly expression, oval face shape, medium skin tone, brown eyes, natural makeup, studio lighting, clean white background, front-facing portrait, high quality, photorealistic, classic bob haircut at chin length, blunt cut with clean geometric lines, straight hair, sleek styling, dark brown hair color
women_hairstyles.pixie-cut: Professional female model, 25-30 years old, neutral friendly expression, oval face shape, medium skin tone, brown eyes, natural makeup, studio lighting, clean white background, front-facing portrait, high quality, photorealistic, modern pixie cut, very short textured hair, longer on top with layers, edgy yet feminine styling, light brown hair
